text: gettuwen iskoleta wala nokadi athulwena lamayin atharin subhashta ee asdeka andunaganna gatha une thathparayak witharayi.

awurudu 50 n ihala yugala klarans homar saha darshana senarathna wisin wata 2-0 k lesa mangala gamage saha kamal gamlath parajayata pathkarana ladaha. (21-12, 21-10) awurudu 55 n ihala kewala janath rohan pranandu wisin wata 2-0 k lesa jayath wikramasinha parajayata pathkarana ladi. (21-15, 21-16) awurudu 60 n ihala kewala luwi karunarathna wisin wata 2-0 k lesa parakrama basnayaka parajayata pathkarana ladi. (21-15, 21-5) awurudu 60 n ihala yugala rohan da silwa saha luwi karunarathna wisin wata 2-0 k lesa parakrama basnayaka saha dab.em. aariyasena parajayata pathkarana ladaha. mama putha gana godak de liwwa.mage blog hithawathunta puthawa amuththek nemeyi.manasikawa adupaduwak thibunath aadaraya lengathukama pirunu ee hithe pitara galana kadulu gedara biththi hathara asse ada idan ahen naha.maha hayiyen ka gahala ummaaාාා kiyannawath thaththage raththaran jiwithe mama kiyannawath me uluwahu athulen pana gena hada ada idan aprel wenakan ahanna labenne naha.
ee nisa samahara bhikshun maha supina jathakayen bana kiyannath ada kamathi na.
man surathalita denna chun pan karaththen aduwata parana pan bagayak aran dennamko.
oowa ithin ohoma thamayi mak korannada?
atham sathwayan sthira, nowenas wana, sadakalika wu brahmaloka ho diwyaloka athayi sitha eewayehi ipadimata sitha katayuthu sampadanaya karayi.

manawa sitha ikmanin kalabalakari bawata pamunuwayi.manaya nam thama kaya,manasa kerehi bandimak athi kara ganimayi.kaya hethuprathya nisa athiwa nathiwa yana rupaskandhayayi.wedana,sangnya,sankhara,winynyana yana godawal sathara sithayi.pudgalaya yanu me rupaskandha ha namaskandhawala samawayayi.mama,mageya yanuwen grahanaya karaganuye me rupa ha nama skandha pahayi.meya panchaskandha namwe.mama wemayi keneku grahanaya karaganuye sirura ha chiththa kriyakariwaya mangin labaganna sanniwedanayi.mese sanniwedanayawimedi chakkhu,sotha,ghana,jiwha,pottabba(sparsha),mano aadi winynyana hayak athi we.me shad winynyana dhathu awidyawen grahanaya karaganima nisa mama,mage aadi drushti upadiyi.meyata sakkayaditti yayi namaki.sakkayaditti prahanaya sandaha nama,rupa athiwima ha nathiwima pilibandawa hethu prathya thrilakshana dharmathawa anuwa sihi nuwanin wimarshanaya kirima hewath widarshana bhawana wadiyayuthuya.

esema mema sama bandumkara nikuthuwakata adalawa “1983 anka 51 darana panathin, 1985 anka 03 darana panathin, 1995 anka 32 saha 2004 anka 02 darana panathin sanshodhitha 1937 anka 07 darana (420 wani adhikaraya wana) liyapadinchi skandha saha surakumpath aagnyapanathe 4 wani waganthiya prakara ma wetha pawari athi balathala anuwa mudal saha krama sampadana amathi mahinda rajapaksha wana mama, 2012 anka 23 darana wisarjana panathin naya margayan ganimata balaya pawarana lada biliyana ekdahas thunsiya thunaka mudalin mehi pahatha upalekhanayehi sandahan aakarayata shri lankawa athulatha nayata ganimata me aagnyawen niyama karami” yanuwen sandahan athara aagnyawa nikuth karana baladhariya lesa mudal saha krama sampadana amathi mahinda rajapaksha, “2013 janawari 01 wani dina kolambaa diya” lesa dakwa atha.
ohuta rusiyanu pemwathiyaka siti bawa mathakaya.

kuda daruwan athara wairasayak ha baktiriyawak magin mishranaya wi mema wairas una pathiriyame thathwayak daknata athi athara galla mathara hambanthota yana disthrikka thunenma mema rogi thathwaya wartha wi athi bawada palath saukhya sewa adhyakshakawaraya sadahan kaleya.

bengala bokka wata pihiti nagenahira indiyanu, buruma, andaman dupath kalapaya mulinma ambaa hatagath kalapaya washayen salakena athara pasuwa eewa indu china kalapaye di enam laoosaya, kambojaya ha wiyatnamaya athulath pilipinaya aashritha pradeshaye di da prabhedanaya wi “pilipina ambaa” namin upa madiliyakda nirmanaya wi thibenawa.

yuda samaye athurudahan wu siya gnyathin soya dena men illamin shri lankawe udghoshanawala yedi sitina janathawata sahaya pala kirima siya wirodhathawaye aramuna bawayi, brithanya demala sansadaye madhya prakashakawaraya bibisi sandeshayata kiya sitiye.
